name: Extended Telecommunications Number
description: The XTN data type is used to specify telecommunications contact information including phone numbers, fax numbers, email addresses, and other electronic communication methods. It provides comprehensive support for various telecommunications formats, international numbering, and communication preferences. XTN replaces the simpler TN (Telephone Number) data type and supports modern communication requirements in healthcare environments.

XTN.1.name: Telephone Number
XTN.1.description: The complete telephone number including area code and number. May include international dialing codes and extensions.

XTN.2.name: Telecommunication Use Code
XTN.2.description: Specifies the intended use of the telecommunications number (e.g., home, work, emergency, pager). Indicates the context and purpose of the contact method.

XTN.3.name: Telecommunication Equipment Type
XTN.3.description: Indicates the type of telecommunications equipment (e.g., phone, fax, email, pager, cellular). Specifies the communication technology being used.

XTN.4.name: Email Address
XTN.4.description: Electronic mail address for email communication. Should follow standard email address format (user@domain.com).

XTN.5.name: Country Code
XTN.5.description: International country code for telephone numbers. Used for international dialing (e.g., 1 for US/Canada, 44 for UK).

XTN.6.name: Area/City Code
XTN.6.description: Area code or city code portion of the telephone number. Regional identifier within the country.

XTN.7.name: Local Number
XTN.7.description: The local telephone number without area code. The subscriber number within the local exchange.

XTN.8.name: Extension
XTN.8.description: Telephone extension number for reaching a specific person or department within an organization.

XTN.9.name: Any Text
XTN.9.description: Additional text or comments about the telecommunications number. May include special dialing instructions or contact notes.

constraints.contactMethod: At least one contact method (phone number or email) should be populated
constraints.formatConsistency: Phone number components should be consistent with the complete number in XTN.1
constraints.emailValidation: Email addresses should follow standard format validation
